subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nathan MacKinnon shares much of Sidney Crosby’s history, but he could manage a feat that eluded Crosby: Win the Calder Trophy as N.H.L. rookie of the year.
snippet: Nathan MacKinnon shares much of Sidney Crosby’s history, but he could manage a feat that eluded Crosby: Win the Calder Trophy as N.H.L. rookie of the year.
